Room.Name: Along the Bald and Sloping Tracks
Room.Description: The slope leading up to the top of the volcano is treacherous, covered in rough and jagged rocks that make every step a potential misstep. The air is thick with the scent of sulfur and ash, and the heat from the volcano's molten core radiates off the rocks, making it almost unbearable to touch. The path itself is narrow and winding, with steep drops on either side that lead down into the fiery depths below. At the top of the slope, the volcano's caldera looms large, a gaping maw that seems to swallow the sky whole.

Room.Name: Along the Bald and Sloping Tracks
Room.Description: The slope leading up to the top of the volcano is treacherous, covered in rough and jagged rocks that make every step a potential misstep. The air is thick with the scent of sulfur and ash, and the heat from the volcano's molten core radiates off the rocks, making it almost unbearable to touch. The path itself is narrow and winding, with steep drops on either side that lead down into the fiery depths below. At the top of the slope, the volcano's caldera looms large, a gaping maw that seems to swallow the sky whole.

Room.Name: Along the Bald and Sloping Tracks
Room.Description: The slope leading up to the top of the volcano is treacherous, covered in rough and jagged rocks that make every step a potential misstep. The air is thick with the scent of sulfur and ash, and the heat from the volcano's molten core radiates off the rocks, making it almost unbearable to touch. The path itself is narrow and winding, with steep drops on either side that lead down into the fiery depths below. At the top of the slope, the volcano's caldera looms large, a gaping maw that seems to swallow the sky whole.

Room.Name: Along the Bald and Sloping Tracks
Room.Description: You stand at the edge of a massive volcanic crater, a gaping maw in the earth's crust that smolders with searing heat and spews forth a thick, acrid smoke. The jagged rim of the caldera stretches out before you, jagged rocks and craggy spires looming ominously against the fiery backdrop of molten magma that churns and bubbles deep below. A narrow, treacherous path winds its way down into the abyss, the only way to access the heart of this fiery inferno. As you peer over the edge, you can feel the intense heat radiating up from the depths below.

Room.Name: A Dirt Road
Room.Description: A plain and simple dirt track which leads West and East.

Room.Name: A Second Intersection in the Dirt Road
Room.Description: Very dull and plain, this area has been scorched by the sun, leaving once aliveanimals and plants dead. To the south appears to be a pleasant scenery, compared to where you stand. To the South is the Cloud giants village, and to the East lies more bland dirt road.

Room.Name: A Dirt Road
Room.Description: This room is very plain and simple. Large red rocks sit off in the background, doing nothing but being scorched by the sun. To the East and West, the dirt road continues.

Room.Name: Information Point
Room.Description: This room is a continuance of the dirt road, though several signs stand here, big enough that you continue to read them. A broken down wooden sign, a large stone tablet and a beautifully crafted marble pillar stand here.

ExtraDescription.Description: Fire Giant Village: The Fire giants are crude beings, and hold several Storm giants captive within their imprisonment camp. Their leader, and guide to success is the Infamous Efreeti. They wish to achieve ruling over the two villages, though have been unsuccessful against them, until the Efreeti came.
Cloud Giant Village: These giants are peaceful, one with nature. They feel as though nature is the purest mental state, and meditation is needed.

Storm Giant Village: The Storm giants are preparing raids against the Fire giants, so they may retrieve their brothern inmates. Once this has been accomplished, they will ally with the Cloud giants, and demand the upkeep of the Fire giants.

Room.Name: A Dark Dirt Road
Room.Description: The road is covered in a slimy, thick mud. For some reason, the sun, nor weather is visible from this room, it seems as though it is almost a portal to some place, though it is not. You can see the light of the sun to the east and west.

Room.Name: A Dirt Road
Room.Description: A thin layer of dirt blows in the wind, somewhat like a dirt storm. The road continues east and west.

Room.Name: A Dirt Road
Room.Description: You are standing on a plain and simple looking dirt road, it is very dry here. The path leads to the east and west.

Room.Name: A Dirt Road
Room.Description: A gust of wind raises, blowing in your eyes. You see a lizard scury off under a crumbling boulder. The path continues to the east and west.

Room.Name: A Turn in the Dirt Road
Room.Description: The roads plainess seems to be leaving as you walk further down the path. A single tree, grows healthily, providing birds a small home. The path continues south and west.

Room.Name: Entering the Volcano
Room.Description: You stand at the rim of the active volcano, the heat emanating from the heart of the volcano is palpable, and the smell of sulfur fills your nose. The ground beneath your feet is made up of a dark, porous rock that looks as if it could crumble at any moment. The lava bed below looks treacherous and deadly, but there seems to be a narrow path that winds its way down into the depths of the volcano.

Room.Name: Rim of the Volcano
Room.Description: You stand at the rim of the active volcano, the heat emanating from the heart of the volcano is palpable, and the smell of sulfur fills your nose. The ground beneath your feet is made up of a dark, porous rock that looks as if it could crumble at any moment. The lava bed below looks treacherous and deadly, but there seems to be a narrow path that winds its way down into the depths of the volcano.

Room.Name: Rim of the Volcano
Room.Description: You stand at the rim of the active volcano, the heat emanating from the heart of the volcano is palpable, and the smell of sulfur fills your nose. The ground beneath your feet is made up of a dark, porous rock that looks as if it could crumble at any moment. The lava bed below looks treacherous and deadly, but there seems to be a narrow path that winds its way down into the depths of the volcano.

ExtraDescription.Description: There is a single tree there, burning down to ash.

Room.Name: Rim of the Volcano
Room.Description: You stand at the rim of the active volcano, the heat emanating from the heart of the volcano is palpable, and the smell of sulfur fills your nose. The ground beneath your feet is made up of a dark, porous rock that looks as if it could crumble at any moment. The lava bed below looks treacherous and deadly, but there seems to be a narrow path that winds its way down into the depths of the volcano.

ExtraDescription.Description: A raccoon stands here, sniffing a pile of ash, which was once a grand staw home.

Room.Name: Rim of the Volcano
Room.Description: You stand at the rim of the active volcano, the heat emanating from the heart of the volcano is palpable, and the smell of sulfur fills your nose. The ground beneath your feet is made up of a dark, porous rock that looks as if it could crumble at any moment. The lava bed below looks treacherous and deadly, but there seems to be a narrow path that winds its way down into the depths of the volcano.

ExtraDescription.Description: A wagon made of solid oak, carrying a load of gravel and dirt sits here, doing nothing.

Room.Name: Rim of the Volcano
Room.Description: A rocky craig forces your progression soley to the east and south. Off in the distance the steady rumble of village life echos, along with the faint caw of a crow. The ground is firm and cracked, the wind blows the barren dust around your boots. Leaning on an awkward slant, a delapedated signpost stands.

ExtraDescription.Description: You see a dark black crow, calling out with a faint caw. Depressing, huh?
Fire giant village to the south, slave pens to the east.

Room.Name: Rim of the Volcano
Room.Description: You stand at the rim of the active volcano, the heat emanating from the heart of the volcano is palpable, and the smell of sulfur fills your nose. The ground beneath your feet is made up of a dark, porous rock that looks as if it could crumble at any moment. The lava bed below looks treacherous and deadly, but there seems to be a narrow path that winds its way down into the depths of the volcano.

ExtraDescription.Description: You see a crazed man, enjoying his job of gutting a partially alive chicken.

Room.Name: A Broken Lava Bed
Room.Description: The heat is oppressive as you make your way through the treacherous, seething lava bed deep within the volcano. The ground beneath your feet is uneven and hot, making each step a struggle. The air is thick with the acrid scent of sulfur, and the roar of the molten lava echoes all around you. The heat and the sulfuric fumes make it difficult to breathe, and you feel sweat pouring down your face and soaking through your clothes. The molten lava flows nearby, glowing an intense orange and casting flickering shadows across the jagged, rocky walls. You must tread carefully, for one wrong step could mean certain doom.

Room.Name: Rim of the Volcano
Room.Description: You stand at the rim of the active volcano, the heat emanating from the heart of the volcano is palpable, and the smell of sulfur fills your nose. The ground beneath your feet is made up of a dark, porous rock that looks as if it could crumble at any moment. The lava bed below looks treacherous and deadly, but there seems to be a narrow path that winds its way down into the depths of the volcano.

ExtraDescription.Description: You see a burly man pounding his large iron hammer and forging armor.

Room.Name: A Broken Lava Bed
Room.Description: The heat is oppressive as you make your way through the treacherous, seething lava bed deep within the volcano. The ground beneath your feet is uneven and hot, making each step a struggle. The air is thick with the acrid scent of sulfur, and the roar of the molten lava echoes all around you. The heat and the sulfuric fumes make it difficult to breathe, and you feel sweat pouring down your face and soaking through your clothes. The molten lava flows nearby, glowing an intense orange and casting flickering shadows across the jagged, rocky walls. You must tread carefully, for one wrong step could mean certain doom.

ExtraDescription.Description: You see a large breastplate, glowing and pulsing with energy. On the front of the plate you see a pair of axes crossing one another.

Room.Name: Rim of the Volcano
Room.Description: You stand at the rim of the active volcano, the heat emanating from the heart of the volcano is palpable, and the smell of sulfur fills your nose. The ground beneath your feet is made up of a dark, porous rock that looks as if it could crumble at any moment. The lava bed below looks treacherous and deadly, but there seems to be a narrow path that winds its way down into the depths of the volcano.

ExtraDescription.Description: You see a foreign man standing there, holding a shiny broadsword in his hands.

Room.Name: A Broken Lava Bed
Room.Description: The heat is oppressive as you make your way through the treacherous, seething lava bed deep within the volcano. The ground beneath your feet is uneven and hot, making each step a struggle. The air is thick with the acrid scent of sulfur, and the roar of the molten lava echoes all around you. The heat and the sulfuric fumes make it difficult to breathe, and you feel sweat pouring down your face and soaking through your clothes. The molten lava flows nearby, glowing an intense orange and casting flickering shadows across the jagged, rocky walls. You must tread carefully, for one wrong step could mean certain doom.

ExtraDescription.Description: You see an array of daggers, maces and broadswords laying on the ground and hanging from racks.

The lava bed below looks treacherous and deadly, but there seems to be a narrow path that winds its way down into the depths of the volcano.

The ground beneath your feet is uneven and hot, making each step a struggle. The air is thick with the acrid scent of sulfur, and the roar of the molten lava echoes all around you. The heat and the sulfuric fumes make it difficult to breathe, and you feel sweat pouring down your face and soaking through your clothes. The molten lava flows nearby, glowing an intense orange and casting flickering shadows across the jagged, rocky walls. You must tread carefully, for one wrong step could mean certain doom.

ExtraDescription.Description: A solid, marble statue standing nearly eighteen feet in height of the Infamous Efreeti. The statue alone sends a shiver down your spine.

Room.Name: A Broken Lava Bed
Room.Description: The heat is oppressive as you make your way through the treacherous, seething lava bed deep within the volcano. The ground beneath your feet is uneven and hot, making each step a struggle. The air is thick with the acrid scent of sulfur, and the roar of the molten lava echoes all around you. The heat and the sulfuric fumes make it difficult to breathe, and you feel sweat pouring down your face and soaking through your clothes. The molten lava flows nearby, glowing an intense orange and casting flickering shadows across the jagged, rocky walls. You must tread carefully, for one wrong step could mean certain doom.

ExtraDescription.Description: They are just large piles of dirt.

Room.Name: A Broken Lava Bed
Room.Description: The heat is oppressive as you make your way through the treacherous, seething lava bed deep within the volcano. The ground beneath your feet is uneven and hot, making each step a struggle. The air is thick with the acrid scent of sulfur, and the roar of the molten lava echoes all around you. The heat and the sulfuric fumes make it difficult to breathe, and you feel sweat pouring down your face and soaking through your clothes. The molten lava flows nearby, glowing an intense orange and casting flickering shadows across the jagged, rocky walls. You must tread carefully, for one wrong step could mean certain doom.

ExtraDescription.Description: It isn't a very good sundial, seems as though kids have set it up, but it does it's own function very well.
This appears to be the only tree within the village square, and it is a very healthy tree too.

Room.Name: A Broken Lava Bed
Room.Description: The heat is oppressive as you make your way through the treacherous, seething lava bed deep within the volcano. The ground beneath your feet is uneven and hot, making each step a struggle. The air is thick with the acrid scent of sulfur, and the roar of the molten lava echoes all around you. The heat and the sulfuric fumes make it difficult to breathe, and you feel sweat pouring down your face and soaking through your clothes. The molten lava flows nearby, glowing an intense orange and casting flickering shadows across the jagged, rocky walls. You must tread carefully, for one wrong step could mean certain doom.

ExtraDescription.Description: Welcome to the Fire Giant Village Square. There are various items which make this the living center of the village square, and there has been an attempt to make this place as nice as possible. If you are a traveller in need of water, there is a fountain within the center of the village square. Signed: Efreeti

Room.Name: A Broken Lava Bed
Room.Description: The heat is oppressive as you make your way through the treacherous, seething lava bed deep within the volcano. The ground beneath your feet is uneven and hot, making each step a struggle. The air is thick with the acrid scent of sulfur, and the roar of the molten lava echoes all around you. The heat and the sulfuric fumes make it difficult to breathe, and you feel sweat pouring down your face and soaking through your clothes. The molten lava flows nearby, glowing an intense orange and casting flickering shadows across the jagged, rocky walls. You must tread carefully, for one wrong step could mean certain doom.

Room.Name: A Broken Lava Bed
Room.Description: The heat is oppressive as you make your way through the treacherous, seething lava bed deep within the volcano. The ground beneath your feet is uneven and hot, making each step a struggle. The air is thick with the acrid scent of sulfur, and the roar of the molten lava echoes all around you. The heat and the sulfuric fumes make it difficult to breathe, and you feel sweat pouring down your face and soaking through your clothes. The molten lava flows nearby, glowing an intense orange and casting flickering shadows across the jagged, rocky walls. You must tread carefully, for one wrong step could mean certain doom.

ExtraDescription.Description: A heap of irregular pitch-black roses, they must be symbolic for something.

Room.Name: A Broken Lava Bed
Room.Description: The heat is oppressive as you make your way through the treacherous, seething lava bed deep within the volcano. The ground beneath your feet is uneven and hot, making each step a struggle. The air is thick with the acrid scent of sulfur, and the roar of the molten lava echoes all around you. The heat and the sulfuric fumes make it difficult to breathe, and you feel sweat pouring down your face and soaking through your clothes. The molten lava flows nearby, glowing an intense orange and casting flickering shadows across the jagged, rocky walls. You must tread carefully, for one wrong step could mean certain doom.

ExtraDescription.Description: This is a statue of a large woman, both in height and muscular build. Upon the insignia around the neck, resembles the Mistress who has enslaved the Storm giant prisoners.

Room.Name: A Broken Lava Bed
Room.Description: The heat is oppressive as you make your way through the treacherous, seething lava bed deep within the volcano. The ground beneath your feet is uneven and hot, making each step a struggle. The air is thick with the acrid scent of sulfur, and the roar of the molten lava echoes all around you. The heat and the sulfuric fumes make it difficult to breathe, and you feel sweat pouring down your face and soaking through your clothes. The molten lava flows nearby, glowing an intense orange and casting flickering shadows across the jagged, rocky walls. You must tread carefully, for one wrong step could mean certain doom.

ExtraDescription.Description: A heap of irregular pitch-black roses, they must be symbolic for something.

Room.Name: Rim of the Volcano
Room.Description: You stand at the rim of the active volcano, the heat emanating from the heart of the volcano is palpable, and the smell of sulfur fills your nose. The ground beneath your feet is made up of a dark, porous rock that looks as if it could crumble at any moment. The lava bed below looks treacherous and deadly, but there seems to be a narrow path that winds its way down into the depths of the volcano.

Room.Name: Rim of the Volcano
Room.Description: You stand at the rim of the active volcano, the heat emanating from the heart of the volcano is palpable, and the smell of sulfur fills your nose. The ground beneath your feet is made up of a dark, porous rock that looks as if it could crumble at any moment. The lava bed below looks treacherous and deadly, but there seems to be a narrow path that winds its way down into the depths of the volcano.

Room.Name: Rim of the Volcano
Room.Description: You stand at the rim of the active volcano, the heat emanating from the heart of the volcano is palpable, and the smell of sulfur fills your nose. The ground beneath your feet is made up of a dark, porous rock that looks as if it could crumble at any moment. The lava bed below looks treacherous and deadly, but there seems to be a narrow path that winds its way down into the depths of the volcano.

ExtraDescription.Description: The ivy appears to be suffocating the trees, killing them slowly, but surely.

Room.Name: Rim of the Volcano
Room.Description: You stand at the rim of the active volcano, the heat emanating from the heart of the volcano is palpable, and the smell of sulfur fills your nose. The ground beneath your feet is made up of a dark, porous rock that looks as if it could crumble at any moment. The lava bed below looks treacherous and deadly, but there seems to be a narrow path that winds its way down into the depths of the volcano.

ExtraDescription.Description: Off in the near distance, a patch of ivy is noticeable. The ivy seems to overtake the trees and suffocates them, and they die slowly, but surely.

Room.Name: Rim of the Volcano
Room.Description: You stand at the rim of the active volcano, the heat emanating from the heart of the volcano is palpable, and the smell of sulfur fills your nose. The ground beneath your feet is made up of a dark, porous rock that looks as if it could crumble at any moment. The lava bed below looks treacherous and deadly, but there seems to be a narrow path that winds its way down into the depths of the volcano.

Room.Name: Rim of the Volcano
Room.Description: You stand at the rim of the active volcano, the heat emanating from the heart of the volcano is palpable, and the smell of sulfur fills your nose. The ground beneath your feet is made up of a dark, porous rock that looks as if it could crumble at any moment. The lava bed below looks treacherous and deadly, but there seems to be a narrow path that winds its way down into the depths of the volcano.

Room.Name: A worn trail
Room.Description: Little more than a dirt track, this road leads east and west. Cold, near lifeless trees of grey bark stretch thier long bony limbs to mesh and intertwine above you. All around you can hear the echoing clammour of the village to the south.

Room.Name: The Hangman's Stump
Room.Description: A grim sight unfolds before your eyes. The path opens somewhat, arching around a large tree stump. Twenty five feet from the ground a tall sturdy limb stretches across the path, a hemp rope tied into a hangman's noose dangles freely tossed by the gentle wind. The noose seems a bit too short, and you figure that a fall from that distance would not break a giant's neck, most who meet thier fate here probably spend a few days in strangulation. The path continues east and west.

Room.Name: A worn trail
Room.Description: Little more than a dirt track, this road leads east and west. The ground here is soggy and damp, the stark yellow mud slurps in protest as you walk. Cold, near lifeless trees of grey bark stretch theirr long bony limbs to mesh and intertwine above you. All around you can hear the echoing clammour of the village to the south. At a glance to the west you see a large stump in the middle of the road.

Room.Name: A Muddy Track
Room.Description: The mud here makes the east and west trail difficult to navigate. Each step needing a touch more concentration and balance to avoid slipping into this dank muck. Huge boot prints riddle the ground, some even deep enough to begin collecting the soil's water and forming footshaped puddles.

Room.Name: An Open Trail
Room.Description: The trees seem to give way now to weeds and other tangled undergrowth. A few stumps pock-mark the edge of the trail. The muddy ground is torn and slick, making it seem like an army had marched through this place. You also notice that to boot prints are of various sizes and depths now, no longer souly the mark of giants, but other races aswell. A strange awful smell reaches your nose, causing you to momentarily hold your breath. From here you can only wander east or west.

Room.Name: An Open Trail
Room.Description: The trees seem to give way now to weeds and other tangled undergrowth. A few stumps pock-mark the edge of the trail. The muddy ground is torn and slick, making it seem like an army had marched through this place. You also notice that to boot prints are of various sizes and depths now, no longer souly the mark of giants, but other races aswell. A strange awful smell reaches your nose, causing you to momentarily hold your breath. To the east the trail takes a turn, though west allows you straight passage.

Room.Name: A Muddy Bend
Room.Description: A small group of slaves work quietly here clearing the sides of the trail from the under brush and stumps. Omniously quiet, the only sound they seem to make is the rattle of the chains they wear. To the south you can clearly see the entrance to the slave pens, the west offers you means to return to the village.

Room.Name: Entering the Slave Pens
Room.Description: You are greeted with a tremendous stench. This place seems to have been carved out of a giant boulder, in stead of actually being built. The walls, floor and ceiling are uneaven and awkward, playing tricks on your equalibrium. Very little light from a few small fires and cracks in the door above you filter about the pens. Dark forms mill about thier daily life, awaiting thier masters commands.

Room.Name: Inside the Slave Pens
Room.Description: Large iron rings are set into the floor here, creating a suitable place to lock away slaves. The spatters of dried blood on the walls, and small row of stocks, give the impression that this place is reserved for those slaves in need of dicipline. Here the slave pens look more like a torture chamber, set in the middle of the stone rooms, to display the fate of those slaves who do not cooperate. Looking around nearly confused you, as there doesn't seem to be a right angle in this place. The room is devoid of decoration, save for the cobwebs on the ceiling.

Room.Name: A Dark Corner in the Slave Pens
Room.Description: Urine stains and other unmentionables litter the cold floor and walls here. The stench is nearly unbearable, none the less you notice a few spots on the floor which look like they serve as sleeping areas.

Room.Name: Inside the Slave Pens
Room.Description: Large iron rings are set into the floor here, creating a suitable place to lock away slaves. The spatters of dried blood on the walls, and small row of stocks, give the impression that this place is reserved for those slaves in need of dicipline. Here the slave pens look more like a torture chamber, set in the middle of the stone rooms, to display the fate of those slaves who do not cooperate. Looking around nearly confused you, as there doesn't seem to be a right angle in this place. The room is devoid of decoration, save for the cobwebs on the ceiling.

Exit.Description: You see a large iron door.

Room.Name: Efreeti's Domain
Room.Description: This is a large room filled with the blazing heat of the sun. The temperature is unbearable living conditions, though standing in the back is an elemental. The walls are made of thick, burning iron, and the ceiling stretches nearly two stories high.

Room.Name: The Center of the Slave Pens
Room.Description: A large pit occupies the middle of the cold stone floor here. This room is vast and spans two stories in height. Against the southern face is a large cluttered altar, it stretches nearly to the ceiling and resembles a gigantic dragon skull. Large bronze brasiers light the room in a hazy orange and yellow glow. You sence that this place was built with reverance, a strange feeling to be directed to anything Giant. This room itself seems to inspire a sense of awe that fills you and beckons to you.

Room.Name: Inside the Slave Pens
Room.Description: Large iron rings are set into the floor here, creating a suitable place to lock away slaves. The spatters of dried blood on the walls, and small row of stocks, give the impression that this place is reserved for those slaves in need of dicipline. Here the slave pens look more like a torture chamber, set in the middle of the stone rooms, to display the fate of those slaves who do not cooperate. Looking around nearly confused you, as there doesn't seem to be a right angle in this place. The room is devoid of decoration, save for the cobwebs on the ceiling.

Room.Name: A Dark Corner in the Slave Pens
Room.Description: Urine stains and other unmentionables litter the cold floor and walls here. The stench is nearly unbearable, none the less you notice a few spots on the floor which look like they serve as sleeping areas.

Room.Name: Inside the Slave Pens
Room.Description: Large iron rings are set into the floor here, creating a suitable place to lock away slaves. The spatters of dried blood on the walls, and small row of stocks, give the impression that this place is reserved for those slaves in need of dicipline. Here the slave pens look more like a torture chamber, set in the middle of the stone rooms, to display the fate of those slaves who do not cooperate. Looking around nearly confused you, as there doesn't seem to be a right angle in this place. The room is devoid of decoration, save for the cobwebs on the ceiling.

Room.Name: A Dark Corner in the Slave Pens
Room.Description: Urine stains and other unmentionables litter the cold floor and walls here. The stench is nearly unbearable, none the less you notice a few spots on the floor which look like they serve as sleeping areas. There is a small boulder which slides off to the side, leading to a dark passage.

Room.Name: A Dark Passage
Room.Description: A secluded dark path, which seems to be in a small cave, leads further into darkness eastwards and back to the slave pens west. A small sign of stone with etchings in it stands off to the side.

ExtraDescription.Description: Enter at your own risk!

Room.Name: A Dark Passage
Room.Description: A steep slope causes you to fall downwards into a large pool of water. You are able to travel outwards to the west, and looking southwards you see nothing, it is pitch-black.

Room.Name: The Unholy Magicians Vault
Room.Description: All the water you were just in has been drained from this vault. The walls are made of heavy iron, the ceiling is made of rock and moss. To the eastern side of the vault is a large picture.

ExtraDescription.Description: This is a picture of the one who calls himself the Unholy Magician. He is obviously a giant due to his large face and stout shoulders. He is wearing long black robes and a large mantle peice around his neck.

Room.Name: Along the Bald and Sloping Tracks
Room.Description: The slope leading up to the top of the volcano is treacherous, covered in rough and jagged rocks that make every step a potential misstep. The air is thick with the scent of sulfur and ash, and the heat from the volcano's molten core radiates off the rocks, making it almost unbearable to touch. The path itself is narrow and winding, with steep drops on either side that lead down into the fiery depths below. At the top of the slope, the volcano's caldera looms large, a gaping maw that seems to swallow the sky whole.

Room.Name: Along the Bald and Sloping Tracks
Room.Description: The slope leading up to the top of the volcano is treacherous, covered in rough and jagged rocks that make every step a potential misstep. The air is thick with the scent of sulfur and ash, and the heat from the volcano's molten core radiates off the rocks, making it almost unbearable to touch. The path itself is narrow and winding, with steep drops on either side that lead down into the fiery depths below. At the top of the slope, the volcano's caldera looms large, a gaping maw that seems to swallow the sky whole.

Room.Name: Along the Bald and Sloping Tracks
Room.Description: The slope leading up to the top of the volcano is treacherous, covered in rough and jagged rocks that make every step a potential misstep. The air is thick with the scent of sulfur and ash, and the heat from the volcano's molten core radiates off the rocks, making it almost unbearable to touch. The path itself is narrow and winding, with steep drops on either side that lead down into the fiery depths below. At the top of the slope, the volcano's caldera looms large, a gaping maw that seems to swallow the sky whole.

Room.Name: Along the Bald and Sloping Tracks
Room.Description: The slope leading up to the top of the volcano is treacherous, covered in rough and jagged rocks that make every step a potential misstep. The air is thick with the scent of sulfur and ash, and the heat from the volcano's molten core radiates off the rocks, making it almost unbearable to touch. The path itself is narrow and winding, with steep drops on either side that lead down into the fiery depths below. At the top of the slope, the volcano's caldera looms large, a gaping maw that seems to swallow the sky whole.

The path itself is narrow and winding, with steep drops on either side that lead down into the fiery depths below. The path itself is narrow and winding, with steep drops on either side that lead down into the fiery depths below. At the top of the slope, the volcano's caldera looms large, a gaping maw that seems to swallow the sky whole.

Room.Name: A Sandy Beach
Room.Description: The sandy beach is a picturesque strip of golden sand that extends as far as the eye can see. The sand is warm and soft underfoot, and grains of it sparkle in the bright sunlight. The waves of the ocean come to shore and gently wash over the sand, creating a soothing sound. The sound of seagulls can be heard overhead, soaring above the crystal-clear water. The water is a brilliant shade of blue and is inviting for a swim. Palm trees and other tropical foliage provide a lush and tropical backdrop to the beach, adding to its natural beauty.

Room.Name: A Sandy Beach
Room.Description: The sandy beach is a picturesque strip of golden sand that extends as far as the eye can see. The sand is warm and soft underfoot, and grains of it sparkle in the bright sunlight. The waves of the ocean come to shore and gently wash over the sand, creating a soothing sound. The sound of seagulls can be heard overhead, soaring above the crystal-clear water. The water is a brilliant shade of blue and is inviting for a swim. Palm trees and other tropical foliage provide a lush and tropical backdrop to the beach, adding to its natural beauty.

NPC.name: fire giant efreeti
NPC.description: A large column of massive flames swirl around a large man's body, a man who appears to be a Giant. This Giant is very muscular-broadened shoulder, immense arm strength, kicks like a bull- as well as skilled. His eyes are a fierce yellow, seeming as though they have a pulse themselves, concentrated upon seeking your death.
NPC.longDescription: (Surrounded by Flames) An incredibly large, mean-looking giant stands here growling.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack AssistRace AssistPlayers
NPC.affectedBy: DetectEvil DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionGood Haste DetectIllusion

NPC.name: unholy mage giant
NPC.description: Before you stands an awe-inspiring figure. He is obviously a fire giant by heritage, but has a similar build to that of a tree trunk. At first glance you conceive that his battle prowess must be unparalleled. As you continue to study the Unholy Magician you come upon his aged eyes. These eyes seem to contain a depth and understanding that almost seem impossible, however somewhere in that depth you sense a dark foreboding chaos present that sends shivers down your spine.
NPC.longDescription: (Black Aura) Enraged by your entrance, an Unholy mage unleashes his darkness upon you.
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectEvil DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionGood Haste DetectIllusion

NPC.name: huge giant guard
NPC.description: This giant is prepared to stop anyone who might attempt to enter the village without permission from the Slavemaster. He is a ruthless and brutal warrior, dedicated to the protection of his village.
NPC.longDescription: An imposing giant looms before you observing all with sinister contempt.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AssistRace AssistPlayers AssistGuard

NPC.name: fire giant patroller guard
NPC.description: This giant is prepared to stop anyone who might attempt to enter the village without permission from the Slavemaster . He is a ruthless and brutal warrior, dedicated to the protection of his village.
NPC.longDescription: A village guard leans against a tree stump, awaiting for duty.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Warrior AssistRace AssistGuard

NPC.name: giant fire collector
NPC.description: Stepping away from this immense giant who stands easily over twenty feet high, you take a deep breath and sigh. He carries a large black book, which he carefully writes upon the sheets of paper within it. Around his waist is several pouches-all which are as big as your torso-jingling with gold and silver coins.
NPC.longDescription: A giant walks around the city carrying a large book, grining evily.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Warrior AssistGuard

NPC.name: giant squire
NPC.description: A young fire giant twirls his sword around, somewhat gracefully, as if preparing to become the next Slavemaster. Built for the job, he is immense for his youthful look. His eyes seem almost frightened of something, or perhaps very concentrated, to the extent that he looks rather fatigued.
NPC.longDescription: A young giant twirls around gleefully, practicing his arts.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Wimpy Warrior AssistRace AssistGuard

NPC.name: young giant fire
NPC.description: With the demonic look of a young mastermind, this young giant walks to you and kicks you in the shins. Nearly the same height as a human, though much more stocky. His large complextion offthrows his youthfulness.
NPC.longDescription: A young giant plays in the near the village square, thinking of evil schemes.

NPC.name: old giant fire
NPC.description: A look of burden and weakness overcomes this giant, for he can barely stand on his legs. His cane seems to support most of his weight, though it doesn't carry the weight of saddness within his eyes.
NPC.longDescription: An old haggard Fire giant walks around the village slowly, holding a cane.

NPC.name: giant fire mistress slavemaster
NPC.description: A reched giant laughs the night away as she enforces the "prisoners" to do their duty. Picking her teeth with a humans rib, she has the awe-inspiring look of a great barbarian.
NPC.longDescription: A slavemaster watches the slaves closely and grins mischieveously.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden DetectGood Sanctuary ProtectionGood DarkVision Regeneration DetectIllusion

NPC.name: fire giant village idiot
NPC.description: Poking himself in the stomach and laughing about it show this giants stupidity. Watch yourself!
NPC.longDescription: The vilage idiot walks around in a circle, laughing to himself.

NPC.name: fire giant armourer
NPC.description: Pounding large steel peices which are red hot with a large hammer, forging some plain armors.
NPC.longDescription: A large Fire giant pounds hot steel with a hammer, making armor.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Warrior AreaAttack Shopkeeper
NPC.affectedBy: DetectEvil DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden DetectGood Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Haste DarkVision Regeneration DetectIllusion

NPC.name: fire giant weaponsmith
NPC.description: Pounding large steel peices which are red hot with a large hammer, forging some plain weapons.
NPC.longDescription: A large Fire giant pounds hot steel with a hammer, making weapons.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Warrior AreaAttack Shopkeeper
NPC.affectedBy: DetectEvil DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden DetectGood Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Haste DarkVision Regeneration DetectIllusion

NPC.name: fire giant butcher
NPC.description: Slicing large peices of chicken and cow, this butcher seems to have an art for the slaughtering process.
NPC.longDescription: A large Fire giant stands over a burning stone oven.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Warrior AreaAttack Shopkeeper
NPC.affectedBy: DetectEvil DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden DetectGood Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Haste DarkVision Regeneration DetectIllusion

NPC.name: fire giant shopkeeper
NPC.description: Filling a water gourd, seeming almost forever, he stands quietly and mutters to himself.
NPC.longDescription: A large Fire giant awaits the next customer to buy his mystical gourds.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Warrior AreaAttack Shopkeeper
NPC.affectedBy: DetectEvil DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden DetectGood Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Haste DarkVision Regeneration DetectIllusion

NPC.name: fire giant healer
NPC.description: This Fire giant Healer appears to be enjoying his ability to heal, so he can now cure wounds and take peoples money for doing so.
NPC.longDescription: A mean looking giant is here healing people for gold.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Warrior Healer AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectEvil DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden DetectGood Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Haste DarkVision Regeneration DetectIllusion

NPC.name: stone gargoyle
NPC.description: A fierce gargoyle watches the shadows as he accepts the prey into the village.
NPC.longDescription: A mean looking gargoyle stands here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Wimpy Warrior AssistRace AssistGuard

NPC.name: storm giant slave
NPC.description: Covered with little clothing and many flesh wounds, this Storm giant has lost all faith in humanity. A slave for all the wrong reasons he thinks, he still wonders why he is here, but his memory has slipped him over the years of endless torture.
NPC.longDescription: A sad-looking Storm giant stands here, taking his punishment.

NPC.name: bold adventurer
NPC.description: This man is just a common man passing through the village. He looks around all he can, but his priorities are to speak with the slavemaster, to negotiate peace. Though he has little confidence in himself.
NPC.longDescription: A bold adventurer walks along the path, looking at the forests.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Wimpy Warrior AssistRace AssistGuard

Item.Name: sword blade flame flaming efreeti
Item.LongDescription: A mass of swirling flames forms a mysterious looking blade.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Evil Bless MeltDrop Frost Sharp TwoHands Poison Unholy

Item.Name: massive platinum plate breastplate spiked spikes
Item.ShortDescription: a massive breastplate covered with spikes
Item.LongDescription: a platinum breastplate with large spikes about it sits here on the ground.

Item.Name: hero helm mask massive
Item.ShortDescription: a massive face mask named 'Hero's Helm'
Item.LongDescription: A massive spiked face mask sits in the dirt, upon the top is inscribed 'Hero'
Item.ExtraFlags: Hum Magic NoDrop Bless NoRemove NoUncurse

Item.Name: greaves massive spiked spikes
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of massive spiked greaves
Item.LongDescription: A set of massive spiked greaves glow with darkness as they collect dust on the ground.

Item.Name: sceptre abyss dark
Item.LongDescription: Pulsating with an evil glow, a Sceptre lies here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Dark Evil Magic Bless AntiGood AntiNeutral Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison

Item.Name: chainmail abyss
Item.LongDescription: Pulsating with an evil glow, a suit of chainmail lies here.

Item.Name: helm abyss
Item.LongDescription: Pulsating with an evil glow, a helm lies here.

Item.Name: greaves abyss
Item.LongDescription: Pulsating with an evil glow, a pair of greaves lies here.

Item.Name: boots abyss
Item.LongDescription: Pulsating with an evil glow, a pair of boots lies here.

Item.Name: gauntlets abyss
Item.LongDescription: Pulsating with an evil glow, a pair of gauntlets lies here.

Item.Name: vambraces abyss
Item.LongDescription: Pulsating with an evil glow, a pair of vambraces lies here.

Item.Name: belt abyss
Item.ShortDescription: the pitch-black belt of the Abyss
Item.LongDescription: Pulsating with an evil glow, a belt lies here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Dark Evil Magic AntiGood AntiNeutral

Item.Name: bracelet abyss
Item.LongDescription: Pulsating with an evil glow, a bracelet lies here.

Item.Name: signet ring fire
Item.ShortDescription: the signet ring of the Fire giant village
Item.LongDescription: A signet ring embossed with a fiery red bronze stone is here.

Item.Name: dual-bladed dual fiery dagger
Item.LongDescription: A bloodied dagger with two blades rests here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Hum Dark Evil Bless AntiGood MeltDrop BurnProof Frost Sharp TwoHands Poison Unholy

Item.Name: tail ice dragon
Item.ShortDescription: the tail from a young ice dragon
Item.LongDescription: A tail covered with freezing dragonscales is here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Hum Evil Magic Bless AntiGood NoRemove Flaming Frost Vorpal TwoHands Unholy

Item.Name: potion bubbling elixir
Item.LongDescription: A small vial is filled with a white bubbling liquid.

ExtraDescription.Description: The potion has a small label 'Speed'.

Item.Name: double blade bladed mithril broadsword
Item.LongDescription: A huge sword made of the finest mithril and craftsmanship.

Item.Name: insignia slavemaster slavemaster's
Item.LongDescription: An unholy insignia bearing the slavemaster's marking awaits to be worn.

Item.Name: ivory armguards arm
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of thick ivory armguards
Item.LongDescription: Smooth ivory wrapped together forming perfect arm shaped figures.

Item.Name: dark robe etch etched skull
Item.ShortDescription: a darkened robe etched with a white skull
Item.LongDescription: A pitch-black robe is draped upon the ground.

Item.Name: book
Item.LongDescription: A huge tax collection book.

Item.Name: vial black quartz
Item.LongDescription: A vial of fine black quartz is filled with a bubbling liquid.

ExtraDescription.Description: The potion has a small label 'Toughened Skin'.

Item.Name: golden gold necklace
Item.LongDescription: A gold necklace shimmers with brilliant color.

Item.Name: golden gold bracelet
Item.LongDescription: A gold bracelet shimmers with brilliant color.

Item.Name: ragged brown cloak
Item.LongDescription: Torn cloth and beeds have been sewn together to form a cloak.

Item.Name: staff knowledge protection
Item.ShortDescription: the staff of knowledge and protection
Item.LongDescription: A staff has carelessly been laid upon the ground.

Item.Name: large gold golden cane
Item.ShortDescription: a large golden cane embedded with diamonds
Item.LongDescription: A sparkling gold cane embedded with diamonds has been left here.

Item.Name: huge axe battleaxe flame
Item.ShortDescription: a dual-bladed battleaxe with tips of flame
Item.LongDescription: A war ready axe lies here with flames spitting from the tips.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Evil Bless NoRemove BurnProof Frost Sharp TwoHands Poison Unholy

Item.Name: battle armor chestplate
Item.ShortDescription: a suit of flaming battle armor
Item.LongDescription: A thick chestplate made of copper, speckled with dried blood is here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Evil Bless NoRemove BurnProof

Item.Name: battle ring loop
Item.ShortDescription: a battle ring shimmering with black flames
Item.LongDescription: Impurities and unholy magics come together and form a small loop.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Evil Bless AntiGood AntiNeutral NoRemove BurnProof

Item.Name: blindfold
Item.LongDescription: A large black leather blindfold lies here.

Item.Name: mystical water gourd
Item.ShortDescription: a large mystical gourd filled with water
Item.LongDescription: Gleaming with the brilliance of magic, this gourd shimmers and glows with energy.

Item.Name: lantern
Item.LongDescription: A hooded brass lantern has been left here.

ExtraDescription.Description: They say, "Use 'hold lantern' to activate."

Item.Name: bag
Item.LongDescription: A small bag.

Item.Name: steak
Item.LongDescription: Sizzling with herbs and spices enhances the perfectness of this steak.

Item.Name: lamb leg
Item.LongDescription: A leg of a lamb lets off a mouth watering scent.

Item.Name: platemail
Item.LongDescription: A suit of heavy steel platemail is here.

Item.Name: helm
Item.LongDescription: A heavy steel helm is here.

Item.Name: leg legplates
Item.LongDescription: A pair of heavy steel legplates lie here.

Item.Name: boots
Item.LongDescription: A pair of heavy steel boots are here.

Item.Name: broadsword
Item.LongDescription: A large steel broadsword.

Item.Name: dagger
Item.LongDescription: A small dagger.

Item.Name: mace
Item.LongDescription: A small mace.

Item.Name: blackwood staff
Item.LongDescription: A large blackwood staff is here.

Item.Name: gold coins
Item.LongDescription: A heap of gold coins is here.
